nextgenAdSDK
search in API

sdk_presentation_compose

Description

Contains the compose specific functionality of the Adition Ad SDK. See the description of the sdk_core module for an in-depth documentation.

Example of Usage

Setup the AdService

The first thing you need to do is create an AdService. You need to pass the networkId, context, and EventHandler to it. Constructor returns true if the AdService is successfully configured or false if not.

runBlocking {
    val isSuccess = AdService.init(NETWORK_ID, applicationContext, EventHandler())
    Log.d("App", "Init is success: $isSuccess")
}
Content copied to clipboard

Displaying Ads

The Composable that will be used to display a mobile creative is called Ad.

For Compose based Apps, there are two ways for displaying Ads:

Convenient

Use the rememberAdState function to fetch an Ad's based on your desired parameters. It returns and AdState object, which you use during initialization of the Ad composable:

val adState = rememberAdState(CONTENT_ID)

Ad(
    adState = adState,
    modifier = Modifier
        .width(500.dp)
        .height(300.dp)
)
Content copied to clipboard

Fine grained control

Alternatively, if you need more control about when requests for Ads actually happen or if you want to load a large number of ads concurrently, you can chose this alternative way:

Create an Advertisement object directly using the desired parameters and the list of all ad renderers that are available. This way, you can request to download ads whenever you need them via loadAdvertisement method.

val ad = Advertisement(
    CONTENT_ID,
    AdComposeRenderRegistry.getAllRendererNames()
)

viewModelScope.launch {
    ad.loadAdvertisement()
}
Content copied to clipboard

For displaying Ad composable, use the variant of rememberAdState which accepts an Advertisement object:

Ad(adState = rememberAdState(ad))
Content copied to clipboard

Displaying Interstitial Ad

The display of inline and interstitial ads is almost the same in terms of implementation. The only thing you need to do to display an interstitial additionally is pass the PlacementType.INTERSTITIAL parameter to the Advertisement.

var ad = Advertisement(
    CONTENT_ID,
    AdComposeRenderRegistry.getAllRendererNames(),
    placementType = PlacementType.INTERSTITIAL
)

var adState = rememberAdState(ad)

Ad(adState = adState)
Content copied to clipboard

Manage Ad State

Ads are managed using AdState. For example, when state changes, you can show the desired display on top of the Ad:

Ad(adState = adState)
when (val state = adState.state) {
    is AdState.State.Error -> {
        val adError = state.adException.adError
        Text(text = adError.description)
    }

    is AdState.State.Loading -> {
        CircularProgressIndicator(
            modifier = Modifier.size(64.dp)
        )
    }

    is AdState.State.Caching -> {
        Text(text = "Caching ad...")
    }

    is AdState.State.AdReadyToDisplay -> {
        Log.i("handleState", "readyToDisplay")
    }
}
Content copied to clipboard

Manage Ad Events

In addition to the state, you can observe events related to the tracking and user interaction with ads. You can find a list of all events in the EventType documentation.

AdService.getInstance().eventHandler?.events?.collect {
    Log.d("AdEvents", "Collected EVENT - $it")
}
Content copied to clipboard
